name: StrikeForce 0.8 BETA
description:
A fun low poly multiplayer fps game developed by Frostbyte Game Studios. Very easy to learn and fun upgrade system with 8+ weapons to choose from. 3 classes and 5 maps at the moment. Also has zombies and friendly bots to help you out. If you shoot at the bots, they will retaliate. 

MAKE SURE YOU HAVE AN INTERNET CONNECTION TO PLAY THIS GAME.
